articles.title: Meta adds its AI chatbot, powered by Llama 3, to the search bar across its apps - TechCrunch
articles.description: Meta updated its Meta AI chatbot today with the en-source Llama3 mode and features such as faster image generation.
articles.content: Meta’s making several big moves today to promote its AI services across its platform. The company has upgraded its AI chatbot with its newest large language model, Llama 3, and it is now running it i… [+3748 chars]

articles.author: Jacek Krywko
articles.title: The largest marine reptile ever could match blue whales in size - Ars Technica
articles.description: Bones from the head of a reptile suggest a body that was well over 20 meters long.
articles.content:
10
Blue whales have been considered the largest creatures to ever live on Earth. With a maximum length of nearly 30 meters and weighing nearly 200 tons, they are the all-time undisputed heavyweight … [+4490 chars]
